data.title: Check Out Patent Portfolio For Johnson and Johnson
data.meta_description: Discover the patent portfolio of Johnson and Johnson with our comprehensive stats analysis. Explore their innovation potential and industry impact now.
data.text:
Johnson & Johnson is a multinational corporation that specializes in developing, manufacturing, and selling a wide range of healthcare products. It was founded in 1886 by Robert Wood Johnson I, James Wood Johnson, and Edward Mead Johnson in New Brunswick, New Jersey, USA.

Today, Johnson & Johnson is one of the largest healthcare companies in the world, with operations in over 60 countries and a market cap of approximately $452 billion

About TTC

At TT Consultants, we're a premier provider of custom intellectual property (IP), technology intelligence, business research, and innovation support. Our approach blends AI and Large Language Model (LLM) tools with human expertise, delivering unmatched solutions.

Our team includes skilled IP experts, tech consultants, former USPTO examiners, European patent attorneys, and more. We cater to Fortune 500 companies, innovators, law firms, universities, and financial institutions.
